title: Goldilocks and the three bears
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Zdenka Deitchova and Milan Klikar
brief_description: The traditional story of “Goldilocks and the three bears” is told in this short animated children’s film. When the Three Bears go out, mischievous Goldilocks enters their house and wrecks havoc. Based on the book by James Marshall.
creator_credit_for_label: Weston Woods Studios, Zdenka Deitchova and Milan Klikar
